Package com.screens

Class CarparkScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.screens.CarparkScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class CarparkScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    This screen shows the player the "car park" which is an interface allowing the user to manage bought fire trucks as well as buy new ones to add to the user's arsenal

      Called when this screen should release all resources.
      private void generateStatLabels()
      Generates labels and add them to the label list
      private void generateStatsTable()
      Builds the stats table for the active fire truck re-built every frame to show the health/water increasing

      Builds each fire truck item which contains: - location label - image button - text button (select or buy)
      private void generateTruckSelector()
      Builds the truck selector section of the screen it is called once the screen is opened and each time the user selects a fire truck
